title: Electrified CO2 valorization in emerging nanotechnologies: a technical analysis of gas feedstock purity and nanomaterials in electrocatalytic and bio-electrocatalytic CO2 conversion
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,1770-1783
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00912B, Perspective
Open Access

Joshua Jack, Aidan Weber, Sara Bolzman, Stephen McCord
This perspective illuminates the crucial need to consider gas feedstock purity and source when designing new electrified CO2 conversion nanomaterials.
